metadata.title: CVE-2021-28902 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: In function read_yin_container() in libyang <= v1.0.225, it doesn't checkwhether the value of retval->ext[r] is NULL. In some cases, it can be NULL,which leads to the operation of retval->ext[r]->flags that results in acrash.

criterions.comment: libyang package in esm-apps/focal is affected and needs fixing.
